statements: DELETE FROM borrowers WHERE borrower_name = 'Alice Smith';
DELETE FROM borrowers WHERE borrower_name = 'John Doe';
DELETE FROM borrower_ratings WHERE borrower_id = 101 AND repayment_history > 3;
DELETE FROM repayment_history WHERE payment_date < '2022-01-01' AND amount_paid > 500.00;
DELETE FROM Ratings WHERE borrower_id = 2000 AND rating < 3.5;
DELETE FROM loans WHERE loan_type = 'Personal' AND loan_amount > 10000;
DELETE FROM repayment_schedule WHERE borrower_id IN (SELECT borrower_id FROM borrowers WHERE borrower_name = 'John Doe');
